snippet: Shirley Knight will star in the coming production of “In Masks Outrageous and Austere,” the final full-length play written by Tennessee Williams.
abstract: Award-winning actress Shirley Knight will star in the production of In Masks Outrageous and Austere, the final full-length play written by Tennessee Williams.
lead_paragraph: Shirley Knight will star in the coming production of “In Masks Outrageous and Austere,” the final full-length play written by Tennessee Williams.

headline.main: Heroine Is Chosen for Last Williams Play
headline.print_headline: Heroine Is Chosen For Last Williams Play
